entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Schefferville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Schefferville Airport 03:44 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -26.9°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -30.2°C
Wind: S 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
